ping.name: ping
ping.description: Sends the ping of the bot and the Discord WS

vanity_url.name: url
vanity_url.description: Sends a notification to the channel you specify when the URL changes
vanity_url.open_embed: I have successfully installed the url notification system on the channel named <#{{channel}}>
vanity_url.close_embed: URL notification system was successfully turned off

report.name: report
report.description: Allows you to send the error you get to the developer

image.name: picture
image.description: Please enter an image related to the error

report_text.name: error-can-you-tell-me
report_text.description: What were you doing when you got this error?

report.send_embed: I successfully forwarded the error to the developer

welcome.name: welcome
welcome.description: Allows you to create a welcome message

picture.name: image
picture.description: Please select an image from your gallery

bye_text.name: bye-message
bye_text.description: {user} => User, {memberCount} => Number of members on the server, {bottom} => spacing

welcome_text.name: welcome-message
welcome_text.description: {user} => User, {memberCount} => Number of members on the server, {bottom} => spacing

welcome.create_welcome_message: I installed the welcome system on <#{{-channels}}>
welcome.close_welcome: I successfully turned off the welcome system
welcome.not_png: Please enter a file ending in .jpg

advertising_block.name: advertising
advertising_block.description: Blocks users on the server from advertising
advertising_block.open_embed_message: I have successfully installed the ad blocking system on the server
advertising_block.close_embed_message: I successfully removed the adblock system from the server
advertising_block.block_message: {user} you should not advertise on this server

ticket.name: ticket
ticket.description: Allows users to create support requests

category.name: category
category.description: Specify the category in which the ticket channel will open

ticket_count.name: ticket-count
ticket_count.description: Specify the maximum number of ticket channels to be opened

ticket.not_ticket_count: Please enter the maximum number of tickets that can be opened
ticket.done_embed: I sent the ticket message to <#{{-channels}}>
ticket.close_embed: I have successfully removed the ticket system from the server
ticket.ticket_create_embed: I created a support request for you. You can click here to go to the support request you created **{{-channels}}**
ticket.max_ticket_count: Moderators are currently viewing support requests from other people, please try again later
ticket.close_question: Are you sure you want to close the ticket?
ticket.not_permissions: You must be a ticket authority to use this
ticket.have_ticket_error_message: You have an active support request now, you can't open it again
ticket.done_add_user: I have successfully added the user to the channel

welcome_member_count.name: target
welcome_member_count.description: Allows you to set the member counter
welcome_member_count.not_welcome_message: Please use this command after activating the welcome system
welcome_member_count.not_number_options: Please enter target number of members
welcome_member_count.open_system_message: I have securely installed target member system on server
welcome_member_count.close_system_message: I have successfully removed the target member system from the server
welcome_member_count.show_text: Target: {{-target_member}} â€¢ ðŸ‘¥ Number of Members: {{-member_count}} â€¢ Remainder: {{-target}}
welcome_member_count.not_welcome: This feature is only available in embed welcome system

level_system.name: level
level_system.description: Allows you to set up the level system on the server
level_system.role_description: Allows you to enter a role in the level system
level_system.not_text_length: Please enter a 200 character leveling message
level_system.open_embed_message: I have successfully installed the level system on the server
level_system.close_embed_message: I removed the level system from the server
level_system.not_1000_length: Please do not apply role casting above 1000 level
level_system.not_role: Please enter the role properly and try again
level_system.done_role: I have successfully added the role you specified

premium.name: premium
premium.description: Only the owner of the bot can use it
premium.error_message: Only my owner can use this command
premium.add_user_premium: I have successfully granted premium to <@{{-users}}>
premium.remove_user_premium: I successfully received a premium membership from <@{{-users}}>

role.name: role
role.description: Allows you to set up the autorole system on your server

error_text.not_role: Please set the role to be assigned to new members
error_text.not_permission: I don't have permission to grant one or more of the roles you provided

done_text.auto_role: I have successfully installed autorole on the server
done_text.auto_role_close: Successfully turned off the autorole system

delete_message.not_100_count: Please enter a number between 1 and 100
delete_message.done: I have successfully removed **{{-count}}** messages from the channel

voice.name: voice
voice.panel_description: Allows you to create a sound panel
voice.member_done_embed: I have securely installed sound panel on server
voice.not_panel: I think this feature is installed on the server, can you try again
voice.not_close_panel: The feature you are trying to use is disabled for now, you can turn it off again

rosette.name: rosette
rosette.add_rosette: I gave the user the badge you successfully set
rosette.have_user: I guess the user doesn't have such a need

settings.name: settings
settings.description: Shows the active status of commands

help.name: help

uptime.name: About
uptime.description: > **{{-bot_name}}** is actively present on **{{-guild_count}}** Server, serving **{{-client_users}}** User!

service.name: Service
service.description: > **{{-bot_name}}** is in active service with **{{-processs}}** Version and V14 Discord.JS Version.

help.not_premium: You need 250 coins to have premium membership
help.add_premium: <@{{-user_id}}> Congratulations, you are now a premium member
help.have_premium: You already have a premium membership

command.welcome_pre_d: > Allows you to set up the picture welcome system
command.greet_d: > Tag and delete new user joining server
command.delete_d: > Allows you to delete messages in the channel

command.role_remove_d: > Allows you to take role from user or users

prize.name: daily
prize.description: Allows you to receive daily coin reward
prize.not_prize: You haven't expired yet, please come back in 24 hours

greet.name: greeting
greet.description: Tag and delete new user who joined the server

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Please select the channel to tag

greet.not_channel: Please enter a channel to tag members
greet.close_system: Successfully turned off the greeting system

greet.not_10_channel: You can use greetings on up to 10 channels
greet.greet.not_5_channel: You can use greetings on up to 5 channels, you must be a premium member to send greetings to 10 channels

twitch.description: Allows you to set up the Twitch announcement system

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Please enter the broadcast announcement channel

twitch.done: I've successfully installed twitch announcement system on <#{{-channel_id}}>
twitch.close: Safely closed the Twitch announcement system

public_register.name: community
public_register.description: Allows you to set up the community registration system

m_role.name: man-rol
m_role.description: Enter the role to be given to male users

g_role.name: girl-rol
g_role.description: Enter the role to be assigned to female users

public_register.not_m_role: Make sure you select the male role and try again
public_register.not_g_role: Make sure you select female role and try again
public_register.not_a_role: Make sure you select the authorized role and try again
public_register.not_u_role: Make sure to select unregistered role and try again
public_register.done_system: I have successfully installed the community system on <#{{-channels}}>
public_register.not_a: Only officials can use this button

reply.register_done: I have successfully registered <@{{-user}}> to the server

reaction_role.name: reaction
reaction_role.description: Allows you to set up the reaction role system

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Select the channel to send the message to

text.name: text
text.description: Please type the text that will appear in the embed

reaction_role.not_role_length: You can enter up to 25 roles
reaction_role.not_perm: I am not authorized to grant {{-error_d}} roles

special_room.description: Allows you to set up the private room system

username.name: channel-id
username.description: Please enter youtube channel id here

youtube_alert.done: I have successfully installed youtube announcement system on <#{{-channel_id}}>
youtube_alert.close: Safely closed the youtube announcement system

money.name: money

send.name: send
send.description: Allows you to send cuckoo coins to anyone you want

user.name: user
user.description: Please select the user to whom the cuckoo coin will be sent

money.name: coin-amount
money.description: Please choose how many cuckoo coins to send to the specified user

money.dont_money: Unfortunately, money transfer failed. You need **{{-money}}** coins
money.done: I have successfully sent money, your current balance is **{{-old_money}}**

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Allows you to ban the user you specify from the server

user.name: user
user.description: Select the user to be banned from the server

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Enter the reason the user was banned

info_user.name: user
info_user.description: Select the user to show ban information

ban.not_client: <@{{user_id}}> Sorry I wasn't made to ban myself
ban.hight_positon: <@{{user_id}}> You need to promote my role or I can't ban anyone
ban.not_user: <@{{user_id}}> The user you selected does not have a ban

unban.name: remove
unban.description: Removes the user's ban from the server

user.name: user
user.description: Which user would you like me to unban

unban.not_client: <@{{user_}}> Sorry I wasn't made to unban myself
